pullrequest.title: Add helper functions to ServerFixture for recording data

content.raw:
There are not too many options (plugins) in jenkins to plot data. The standard plot plugin has some options. @scpeters what would be your preferred way to visualize it?

Another option would be to generate the plot inside the jenkins job (no matter how) and export the image, datasets, whatever in the same way that we are exporting .debs. That could generate something like https://wiki.jenkins-ci.org/download/attachments/63144496/screenshot2.png?version=1&modificationDate=1343939274000.

If we look for a more integration into jenkins (like making the build to be unstable or fail if the values go down) we can try to integrate the performance plugin.
content.html:
There are not too many options (plugins) in jenkins to plot data. The standard plot plugin has some options. @scpeters what would be your preferred way to visualize it?

Another option would be to generate the plot inside the jenkins job (no matter how) and export the image, datasets, whatever in the same way that we are exporting .debs. That could generate something like https://wiki.jenkins-ci.org/download/attachments/63144496/screenshot2.png?version=1&modificationDate=1343939274000.

If we look for a more integration into jenkins (like making the build to be unstable or fail if the values go down) we can try to integrate the performance plugin.
